DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the effectiveness and the costs of a quantitative and qualitative nutritional supplementation in elderly patients
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness and Cost of a Quantitative and Qualitative Nutritional Supplementation in Elderly Patients
DOC.criteria: Hospitalization into a geriatric care unit age > 70 years C reactive protein > 30 mg/l 25 < albumin < 35 g/l 130 < Na < 145 mmol/l BMI < 22 weight loss > 10 % within the last 6 months MNA < 23.5 diabetes mellitus severe digestive failure enteral or parenteral nutrition renal,cardiac or digestive failure lactose intolerance terminal phase severe pathology MMS < 15
